GK22bharst_u:8: abodhopahatāḥ cānye jīrṇam aṅge subhāṣitam || BharSt_1.2 ||
GK22bharst_u:9: ajñaḥ sukham ārādhyaḥ sukhataram ārādhyate viśeṣajñaḥ |
GK22bharst_u:11: brahmāpi taṃ naraṃ na rañjayati || BharSt_1.3 ||
GK22bharst_u:14_0: bhujaṅgam api kopitaṃ śirasi puṣpavad dhārayet na tu pratiniviṣṭa-mūṛkha-jana-cittam
GK22bharst_u:14_1: ārādhayet labheta sikatāsu tailam api yatnataḥ pīḍayan pibec ca mṛga-tṛṣṇikāsu salilaṃ
GK22bharst_u:15: kvacid api paryaṭan śaśa-viṣāṇam āsādayet na tu pratiniviṣṭa-mūrkha-cittam ārādhayet || BharSt_1.5

GK22bharst_u:20: svāyattam ekānta-guṇaṃ vidhātrā vinirmitaṃ chādanam ajñatāyāḥ |
GK22bharst_u:21: viśeṣāataḥ sarva-vidāṃ samāje vibhūṣaṇaṃ maunam apaṇḍitānām || BharSt_1.7 ||
GK22bharst_u:22_0: yadā kiñcij-jño 'haṃ dvipa iva madāndhaḥ samabhavaṃ tadā sarvajño 'smīty abhavad
GK22bharst_u:22_1: avaliptaṃ mama manaḥ yadā kiñcit kiñcid budhajana-sakāśād avagataṃ tadā mūrkho 'smīti
GK22bharst_u:22_2: jvara iva mado me vyapagataḥ || BharSt_1.8 ||
GK22bharst_u:25_0: surapatim api śvā pārśvasthaṃ vilokya na śaṅkate na hi gaṇayati kṣudro jantuḥ parigraha-phalgutām
GK22bharst_u:25_1: śiraḥ śārvaṃ svargāt paśupati-śirastaḥ kṣitidharaṃ mhīdhrād uttuṅgād avanim avaneś
GK22bharst_u:28: śakyo vārayituṃ jalena hutabhuk cchatreṇa sūryātapo nāgendro niśitāgkuśena samado daṇḍena go-gardabhau |
GK22bharst_u:29: vyādhir bheṣaja-saṅgrahaiś ca vividhair mantra-prayogair viṣaṃ sarvasyauṣadham asti śāstra-vihitaṃ mūrkhasya nasty auṣadhim ||
GK22bharst_u:32: tṛṇaṃ na khādann api jīvamānas tad bhāga-dheyaṃ paramaṃ paśūnām || BharSt_1.12 ||
GK22bharst_u:33: yeṣāṃ na vidyā na tapo na dānaṃ jñānaṃ na śīlaṃ na guṇo na dharmaḥ |
GK22bharst_u:40: vikhyātāḥ kavayo vasanti viṣaye yasya prabhor nirdhanāḥ |
GK22bharst_u:41: taj-jāḍyaṃ vasudhādipasya kavayas tv arthaṃ vināpīśvarāḥ kutsyāḥ syuḥ kuparīkṣakā hi maṇayo yair arghataḥ pātitāḥ || BharSt_1.15 ||
GK22bharst_u:42: hartur yāti na gocaraṃ kim api śaṃ puṣṇāti yat sarvadā 'py
GK22bharst_u:43: arthibhyaḥ pratipādyamānam aniśaṃ prāpnoti vṛddhiṃ parām |
GK22bharst_u:44: kalpānteṣv api na prayāti nidhanaṃ vidyākhyam antardhanaṃ yeṣāṃ tān prati mānam ujjhata nṛpāḥ kas taiḥ saha spardhate || BharSt_1.16
GK22bharst_u:45: adhigata-paramārthān paṇḍitān māvamaṃsthās tṛṇam iva laghu lakṣmīr naiva tān saṃruṇaddhi
GK22bharst_u:47: na bhavati bisatantur vāraṇaṃ vāraṇānām || BharSt_1.17 ||
GK22bharst_u:48: ambhojinī-vana-vihāra-vilāsam eva haṃsasya hanti nitarāṃ kupito vidhātā |
GK22bharst_u:51: keyūrāṇi na bhūṣayanti puruṣaṃ hārā na candrojjvalā na snānaṃ na vilepanaṃ na kusumaṃ nālaṅkṛtā mūrdhajāḥ |
GK22bharst_u:52: vāṇy ekā samalaṅkaroti puruṣaṃ yā saṃskṛtā dhāryate kṣīyante khalu bhūṣaṇāni satataṃ vāg-bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇam || BharSt_1.19 ||
GK22bharst_u:53: vidyā nāma narasya rūpam adhikaṃ pracchanna-guptaṃ dhanaṃ vidyā bhogakarī yaśaḥ-sukhakarī vidyā gurūṇāṃ guruḥ |
GK22bharst_u:54: vidyā bandhujano videśa-gamane vidyā parā devatā
GK22bharst_u:55: vidyā rājasu pūjyate na tu dhanaṃ vidyā-vihīnaḥ paśuḥ || BharSt_1.20 ||
GK22bharst_u:56: kṣāntiś cet kavacena kiṃ kim aribhiḥ krodho 'sti ced dehināṃ jñātiś ced analena kiṃ yadi suhṛd divyauṣadhaṃ kiṃ phalam |
GK22bharst_u:57: kiṃ sarpair yadi durjanāḥ kim u dhanair vidyā 'navadyā yadi vrīḍā cet kim u bhūṣaṇaiḥ sukavitā yady asti rājyena kim || BharSt_1.21 ||
GK22bharst_u:58: dākṣiṇyaṃ svajane dayā parijane śāṭhyaṃ sadā durjane prītiḥ sādhujane nayo nṛpa-jane vidvaj-jane cārjavam |
GK22bharst_u:59: śauryaṃ śatru-jane kṣamā guru-jane kāntā-jane dhṛṣṭatā ye caivaṃ puruṣāḥ kalāsu kuśalās teṣv eva loka-sthitiḥ || BharSt_1.22 ||
GK22bharst_u:60: jāḍyaṃ dhiyo harati siñcati vāci satyaṃ mānonnatiṃ diśati pāpam apākaroti |
GK22bharst_u:61: cetaḥ prasādayati dikṣu tanoti kīrtiṃ sat-saṅgatiḥ kathaya kiṃ na karoti puṃsām || BharSt_1.23
GK22bharst_u:66: sūnuḥ sac-caritaḥ satī priyatamā svāmī prasādonmukhaḥ snigdhaṃ mitram avañcakaḥ parijano niḥkleśa-leśaṃ manaḥ |
GK22bharst_u:67: ākāro ruciraḥ sthiraś ca vibhavo vidyāvadātaṃ mukhaṃ tuṣṭe viṣṭapa-kaṣṭa-hāriṇi harau samprāpyate dehinā || BharSt_1.25 ||
GK22bharst_u:70: tṛṣṇā-sroto vibhaṅgo guruṣu ca vinayaḥ sarva-bhūtānukampā
GK22bharst_u:71: sāmānyaḥ sarva-śāstreṣv anupahata-vidhiḥ śreyasām eṣa panthāḥ ||
GK22bharst_u:72: prārabhyate na khalu vighna-bhayena nīcaiḥ prārabhya vighna-vihatā viramanti madhyāḥ |
GK22bharst_u:73: vighnaiḥ punaḥ punar api pratihanyamānāḥ prārabdham uttama-janā na parityajanti || BharSt_1.27
GK22bharst_u:74: asanto nābhyarthyāḥ suhṛd api na yācyaḥ kṛśa-dhanaḥ

GK22bharst_u:76: vipady uccaiḥ stheyaṃ padam anuvidheyaṃ ca mahatāṃ satāṃ kenoddiṣṭaṃ viṣamam asidhārā-vratam idam || BharSt_1.28 ||
GK22bharst_u:77: kṣut-kṣāmo 'pi jarā-kṛśo 'pi śithila-prāṇo 'pi kaṣṭāṃ daśām āpanno 'pi vipanna-dīdhitir iti prāṇeṣu naśyatsv api |
GK22bharst_u:79: kiṃ jīrṇaṃ tṛṇam atti māna-mahatām agresaraḥ kesarī || BharSt_1.29 ||
GK22bharst_u:80: svalpa-snāyu-vasāvaśeṣa-malinaṃ nirmāṃsam apy asthi goḥ śvā labdhvā paritoṣam eti na tu tat tasya kṣudhā-śāntaye |
GK22bharst_u:81: siṃho jambukam aṅkam āgatam api tyaktvā nihanti dvipaṃ sarvaḥ kṛcchra-gato 'pi vāñchanti janaḥ sattvānurūpaṃ phalam ||
GK22bharst_u:84: śvā piṇḍadasya kurute gaja-puṅgavas tu dhīraṃ vilokayati cāṭu-śataiś ca bhuṅkte || BharSt_1.31
GK22bharst_u:85: parivartini saṃsāre mṛtaḥ ko vā na jāyate |
GK22bharst_u:86: sa jāto yena jātena yāti vaṃśaḥ samunnatim || BharSt_1.32 ||
GK22bharst_u:91: santy anye 'pi bṛhaspati-prabhṛtayaḥ sambhāvitāḥ pañcaṣās tān praty eṣa viśeṣa-vikrama-rucī rāhur na vairāyate |
GK22bharst_u:92: dvāv eva grasate divākara-niśā-prāṇeśvarau bhāskarau bhrātaḥ parvaṇi paśya dānava-patiḥ śīrṣāvaśeṣākṛtiḥ vahati bhuvana-śreṇiṃ śeṣaḥ phaṇāphalaka-sthitāṃ
GK22bharst_u:93: kamaṭha-patinā madhye-pṛṣṭhaṃ sadā sa ca dhāryate |

GK22bharst_u:97: na cāsau sampātaḥ payasi payasāṃ patyur ucitaḥ || BharSt_1.36 ||
GK22bharst_u:100: prakṛtir iyaṃ sattvavatāṃ na khalu vayas tejaso hetuḥ || BharSt_1.37 ||
GK22bharst_u:101: jātir yātu rasātalaṃ guṇa-gaṇais tatrāpy adho gamyatāṃ
GK22bharst_u:102: śīlaṃ śaila-taṭāt patatv abhijanaḥ sandahyatāṃ vahninā |
GK22bharst_u:103: śaurye vairiṇi vajram āśu nipatatv artho 'stu naḥ kevalaṃ yenaikena vinā guṇas tṛṇa-lava-prāyāḥ samastā ime || BharSt_1.38 ||
GK22bharst_u:106: antaraṃ nābhijānāmi nirdhanasya mṛtasya ca || BharSt_1.39 ||

GK22bharst_u:112: hrīr madyād anavekṣaṇād api kṛṣiḥ snehaḥ pravāsāśrayān maitrī cāpraṇayāt samṛddhir anayāt tyāga-pramādād dhanam || BharSt_1.42 ||
GK22bharst_u:113: dānaṃ bhogo nāśas tisro gatayo bhavanti vittasya |

GK22bharst_u:120: ataś cānaikāntyād guru-laghutayā 'rtheṣu dhaninām avasthā vastūni prathayati ca saṅkocayati ca || BharSt_1.45 ||

GK22bharst_u:125: ājñā kīrtiḥ pālanaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ dānaṃ bhogo mitra-saṃrakṣaṇaṃ ca yeṣām ete ṣaḍguṇā na pravṛttāḥ

GK22bharst_u:133: re re cātaka sāvadhāna-manasā mitra kṣaṇaṃ śrūyatām

GK22bharst_u:135: kecid vṛṣṭibhir ārdrayanti vasudhāṃ garjanti kecid vṛthā yaṃ yaṃ paśyasi tasya tasya purato mā brūhi dīnaṃ vacaḥ || BharSt_1.51 ||
GK22bharst_u:141: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kim asau na bhayaṅkaraḥ || BharSt_1.53 ||

GK22bharst_u:145: lobhaś ced aguṇena kiṃ piśunatā yady asti kiṃ pātakaiḥ satyaṃ cet tapasā ca kiṃ śuci mano yady asti tīrthena kim |
GK22bharst_u:146: saujanyaṃ yadi kiṃ guṇaiḥ sumahimā yady asti kiṃ maṇḍanaiḥ
GK22bharst_u:147: sad-vidyā yadi kiṃ dhanair apayaśo yady asti kiṃ mṛtyunā || BharSt_1.55 ||
GK22bharst_u:148: śaśī divasa-dhūsaro galita-yauvanā kāminī saro vigata-vārijaṃ mukham anakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ |
GK22bharst_u:150: nṛpāṅgaṇa-gataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me || BharSt_1.56 ||
GK22bharst_u:153: hotāram api juhvānaṃ spṛṣṭo vahati pāvakaḥ || BharSt_1.57 ||
GK22bharst_u:155: dhṛṣṭaḥ pārśve vasati ca sadā dūrataś cāpragalbhaḥ |
GK22bharst_u:156: kṣāntyā bhīrur yadi na sahate prāyaśo nābhijātaḥ sevādharmaḥ parama-gahano yoginām apy agamyaḥ udbhāsitākhila-khalasya viśṛṅkhalasya
GK22bharst_u:160: ārambha-gurvī kṣayiṇī krameṇa laghvī purā vṛddhimatī ca paścāt |
GK22bharst_u:165: vāñchā sajjana-saṅgame para-guṇe prītir gurau namratā
GK22bharst_u:166: vidyāyāṃ vyasanaṃ sva-yoṣiti ratir lokāpavādād bhayam |
GK22bharst_u:167: bhaktiḥ śūlini śaktir ātma-damane saṃsarga-muktiḥ khale yeṣv ete nivasanti nirmala-guṇās tebhyo narebhyo namaḥ || BharSt_1.62 ||
GK22bharst_u:168: vipadi dhairyam athābhyudaye kṣamā sadasi vākya-paṭutā yudhi vikramaḥ |
GK22bharst_u:172: priyaṃ kṛtvā maunaṃ sadasi kathanaṃ cāpy upakṛteḥ |
GK22bharst_u:174: satāṃ kenoddiṣṭaṃ viṣamam asidhārā-vratam idam || BharSt_1.64 ||
GK22bharst_u:176: mukhe satyā vāṇī vijayi bhujayor vīryam atulam |
GK22bharst_u:177: hṛdi svacchā vṛttiḥ śrutim adhigataṃ ca śravaṇayor vināpy aiśvaryeṇa prakṛti-mahatāṃ maṇḍanam idam || BharSt_1.65 ||
GK22bharst_u:178: sampatsu mahatāṃ cittaṃ bhavaty utpala-komalam |āpatsu ca mahāśailaśilā-
GK22bharst_u:180: santaptāyasi saṃsthitasya payaso nāmāpi na jñāyate muktākāratayā tad eva nalinī-patra-sthitaṃ rājate |
GK22bharst_u:183: prīṇāti yaḥ sucaritaiḥ pitaraṃ sa putro yad bhartur eva hitam icchati tat kalatram |
GK22bharst_u:184: tan mitram āpadi sukhe ca sama-kriyaṃ yad etat trayaṃ jagati puṇya-kṛto labhante || BharSt_1.68
GK22bharst_u:185: eko devaḥ keśavo vā śivo vā hy ekaṃ mitraṃ bhūpatir vā yatir vā |
GK22bharst_u:186: eko vāsaḥ pattane vā vane vā hy ekā bhāryā sundarī vā darī vā || BharSt_1.69 ||
GK22bharst_u:189: kṣāntyaivākṣepa-rukṣākṣara-mukhara-mukhān durjanān dūṣayantaḥ santaḥ sāścarya-caryā jagati bahu-matāḥ kasya nābhyarcanīyāḥ ||
GK22bharst_u:190: bhavanti namrās taravaḥ phalodgamair navāmbubhir dūrāvalambino ghanāḥ |
GK22bharst_u:191: anuddhatāḥ sat-puruṣāḥ samṛddhibhiḥ svabhāva eṣa paropakāriṇām || BharSt_1.71 ||
GK22bharst_u:192: śrotraṃ śrutenaiva na kuṇḍalena dānena pāṇir na tu kaṅkaṇena |
GK22bharst_u:195: pāpān nivārayati yojayate hitāya guhyaṃ nigūhati guṇān prakaṭīkaroti |
GK22bharst_u:196: āpad-gataṃ ca na jahāti dadāti kāle san-mitra-lakṣaṇam idaṃ pravadanti santaḥ || BharSt_1.73
GK22bharst_u:197: padmākaraṃ dinakaro vikacīkaroti camdrp volāsayati kairava-cakravālam |
GK22bharst_u:198: nābhyarthito jaladharo 'pi jalaṃ dadāti santaḥ svayaṃ parahite vihitābhiyogāḥ || BharSt_1.74
GK22bharst_u:199: eke sat-puruṣāḥ parārtha-ghaṭakāḥ svārthaṃ parityajanti ye
GK22bharst_u:200: sāmānyās tu parārtham udyama-bhṛtaḥ svārthāvirodhena ye |
GK22bharst_u:201: te 'mī mānuṣa-rākṣasāḥ parahitaṃ svārthāya nighnanti ye ye tu ghnanti nirarthakaṃ parahitaṃ te ke na jānīmahe || BharSt_1.75 ||
GK22bharst_u:202: kṣīreṇātmagatodakāya hi guṇā dattā purā te 'khilā
GK22bharst_u:203: kṣīrottāpam avekṣya tena payasā svātmā kṛśānau hutaḥ |
GK22bharst_u:204: gantuṃ pāvakam unmanas tad abhavad dṛṣṭvā tu mitrāpadaṃ yuktaṃ tena jalena śāmyati satāṃ maitrī punas tv īdṛśī || BharSt_1.76 ||
GK22bharst_u:205: itaḥ svapiti keśavaḥ kulam itas tadīya-dviṣām
GK22bharst_u:206: itaś ca śaraṇārthināṃ śikhariṇāṃ gaṇāḥ śerate |
GK22bharst_u:208: aho vitatam ūrjitaṃ bhara-sahaṃ sindhor vapuḥ || BharSt_1.77 ||
GK22bharst_u:209: tṛṣṇāṃ chindhi bhaja kṣamāṃ jahi madaṃ pāpe ratiṃ mā kṛthāḥ satyaṃ brūhy anuyāhi sādhu-padavīṃ sevasva vidvaj-janam |
GK22bharst_u:210: mānyān mānaya vidviṣo 'py anunaya prakhyāpaya praśrayaṃ
GK22bharst_u:211: kīrtiṃ pālaya duḥkhite kuru dayām etat satāṃ ceṣṭitam || BharSt_1.78 ||
